column1: This example illustrating NASA Ames file format index 2310 is based on results
from Murgatroyd (1969) as displayed in Brasseur and Solomon

column3: 1984 (p.36). It is representative of the mean zonal

column1: wind distribution in the winter hemisphere as a function of latitude and height.
The first date on line 7 (1st of January 1969) is fictitious.
The files included in this data set illustrate each of the 9 NASA Ames file format
indices (FFI). A detailed description of the NASA Ames format can be found on the
Web site of the British Atmospheric Data Centre (BADC) at
Reference: S. E. Gaines and R. S. Hipskind

column2: 1998. This work can be found at
